data.name: MinLength
data.value: {0} must be at least {1} characters long.

data.name: PasswordMinLength
data.value: Password must be at least {0} characters long.

data.name: PasswordUppercase
data.value: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.

data.name: PasswordLowercase
data.value: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.

data.name: PasswordNumber

data.name: PasswordSpecialCharacter
